interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Leyla Milani Hair Styling Spray - Professional Extra Firm Hold Flexible Hairspray, 3-Level Adjustable Nozzle, Best Heat Resistant Anti-Humidity Finishing Hair Sprays, Hold it Right There (10oz)
Review Date: 2017/12/16
Store: Leyla Milani Hair
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '10 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 1.7 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have kind of fine hair, but it is like I have alot of it. My hair normally when I curl it is flat within 1 hour tops. Even when I use hair spray, to even get it to hold I have to use alot of hairspray and then my hair feels so stiff and gross looking. This hair spray held my hair all day long and my hair was not at all stiff or hard or sticky, it was very free flowing. I absolutely love the smell of this hair spray. You adjust the spray flow on the nozzle. So depending on how I want my hair to be for the day is whether I use  the light, the medium or the high spray.
Review Title: HELD MY HAIR CURLS ALL DAY LONG & SMELLS GREAT
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Silicone Makeup Sponge 2 Pack Premium Quality Silisponge -Easy To Wash Beauty Sponge Applicator for Flawless Application of Liquid Foundation,Primer, Concealer by SEALUXE
SEALUXE
{'Brand': 'SEALUXE', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.5 x 3.5 x 0.6 inches', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup'}
My 18 year old grand daughter does her full face make up everyday whether she is leaving the house or not. I will admit she is pretty good at it, but she does spend alot of money on it. She had been using a sponge type and what she said that she really likes about this blender is that there is alot less waste of makeup, since the sponge absorbs it and this silicone blender spreads it. She said it spreads alot more evenly also and she was very happy with how she could clean it easily in water after each use.
SPREADS EVENLY & CLEANS EASILY
Leyla Milani Hair Styling Spray - Professional Extra Firm Hold Flexible Hairspray, 3-Level Adjustable Nozzle, Best Heat Resistant Anti-Humidity Finishing Hair Sprays, Hold it Right There (10oz)
Leyla Milani Hair
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '10 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 1.7 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
I have kind of fine hair, but it is like I have alot of it. My hair normally when I curl it is flat within 1 hour tops. Even when I use hair spray, to even get it to hold I have to use alot of hairspray and then my hair feels so stiff and gross looking. This hair spray held my hair all day long and my hair was not at all stiff or hard or sticky, it was very free flowing. I absolutely love the smell of this hair spray. You adjust the spray flow on the nozzle. So depending on how I want my hair to be for the day is whether I use  the light, the medium or the high spray.
HELD MY HAIR CURLS ALL DAY LONG & SMELLS GREAT
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Demographics**: Likely a family-oriented individual with an interest in cosmetics and hair care, particularly for younger generations (e.g., a granddaughter).
- **Product Usage**: Shows a preference for beauty tools and hair care products that enhance styling efficiency and performance while minimizing product waste.
- **Quality Preference**: Values ease of cleaning and practical functionality, as indicated by preferences for tools and products that maintain hygiene, deliver effective results, and feature adjustable options for personalized use.
- **Importance of Performance**: Prioritizes products that improve makeup application and hair styling, ensuring even distribution and long-lasting hold while maintaining a natural look.
- **Feedback Behavior**: Engages in product reviews, sharing positive experiences especially when products meet or exceed expectations, emphasizing qualities like scent and hold.
- **Cosmetic Trends**: Emphasizes innovative products in both beauty and hair care, particularly those that stand out from standard options, such as adjustable application methods for customized results.

Overall, the user appreciates functional and effective beauty and hair care tools that are easy to maintain, aiming for a flawless finish in makeup application and reliable styling for personal or family use. Their recent purchase reflects a growing interest in versatile hair products that offer performance and pleasant usage experience.
